### MatchWithRetain() {#a91ef366645fbd66f709174e3b396fb92}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool BottomUpPtrState::MatchWithRetain ()">
Return true if this set of releases can be paired with a release.

Modifies state appropriately to reflect that the matching occurred if it is successful.

It is assumed that one has already checked that the RCIdentity of the retain and the RCIdentity of this ptr state are the same.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/objcarc/ptrstate-h/#l00181">181</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/objcarc/ptrstate-h">PtrState.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/objcarc/ptrstate-cpp/#l00203">203</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/objcarc/ptrstate-cpp">PtrState.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
